issue.title: Setting GTEST_HOME Fails on CMake run
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-924?focusedCommentId=16104353) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This appears to be resolved. I did

```Java
conda install gtest -p $CPP_TOOLCHAIN
export GTEST_HOME=$CPP_TOOLCHAIN
```

and everything is looking OK. please reopen if you run into a problem
